item.description:
I just got back from Catch a Healthy Habit.
Due to the Father's Day Weekend next week end,
Lori decided to reschedule the Murder Mystery Night to June 27th.

Go to the members list to send Lori Larsen an e-mail or call Lori to register 203-933-2200.

The fee has gotten more expensive.
The fee is now $29.00.
Payment is to be made to Lori Larsen

Be immersed in an evening of treachery, murder, blackmail, intrigue and betrayal.
Dinner and Music

There will be prizes awarded for best costume, best sleuth, best actor/actress.
Comes with great food, live music and a MURDER!!

RSVPing on Meetup does NOT mean that a spot is saved for you.

Do not RSVP unless you are absolutely sure you can come and come on time as it can mess up the evening.

Everyone plays a part and as an actor you may kill or be killed.
Be prepared for the unexpected.

Limited Guests,

Call Now [masked]


http://lookatmenow22....

lookatmenow22.com/

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone attend #5 Murder at Cafe @ June 27
